questions.question_text: Which three ways are SD-Access and ACI Fabric similar? (Choose three.)
Which is a function of the Proactive Insights feature of Cisco DNA Center Assurance?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Proactive Insights is for analyzing traffic and trends to generate alerts, so answer D would be the most accurate

Selected Answer: D
i think is D

choices.B: generating synthetic traffic to perform tests that raise awareness of potential network issues
choices.D: pointing out where the most serious issues are happening in the network
choices.C: enabling you to see the complete path of packets from the client to the end application
choices.A: enabling you to quickly view all of the contextual information related to a single user

questions.question_text: Which option will help build your customers platform during the discovery phase?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
In the discovery phase of a network design project, the primary goal is to understand the customerâ€™s business, technical, and operational requirements. The business case helps define why the project is being considered in the first place by outlining the problems, goals, benefits, and justification for moving forward.

Answer: Business Case

Selected Answer: D
A POV (Point of View) report is typically created during the discovery phase of a project.

comments.content: I would suspect that POV stands for Proof of Value here

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
i tink is B
